screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text" ].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0 ] + 60,textsize[1 ] + 80) offset=60 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0 ] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1 ] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text" ].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list" ].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1 ])) self["list" ].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth=wsize[0 ] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: VideoEnhancementPreview
screen.title: VideoEnhancementPreview
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. # here : set the slider to begin at 400 instead of harcoded plugin default = 300
self['config'].l.setSeperation(400)

screen.title: VideoEnhancementSetup
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. # here : set the slider to begin at 400 instead of harcoded plugin default = 300 # limitation : does not work, if you getting back from preview to setup
self['config'].l.setSeperation(400)

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,2),size = (200,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the MenuText, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (200,5),size = (30,30),png = 2),# index 1 i direction pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250,2),size = (450,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# index 2 is remote name/number MultiContentEntryText(pos = (750,2),size = (100,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# index 3 is length of call MultiContentEntryText(pos = (870,2),size = (320,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 5),# index 4 is my number/name for number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",28)], "itemHeight": 40 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,2),size = (630,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the name,index 1 is shortname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (655,2),size = (240,38),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# index 2 is number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",28)], "itemHeight": 40 }

{"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 5), size = (840, 40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 4), size = (36, 36), png = 9), # index 9 is the status pixmap) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 45 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (390, 40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (400, 0), size = (850, 40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1)], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 40 }
